data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 2, Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Victor Sosa of Pachuca smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Juarez.
Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pachuca's Victor Davila is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 4, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Pachuca throw-in in Juarez's half.
Juarez to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Pachuca.
In the minute 8, In Ciudad Juarez, Luis Chavez of Pachuca is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Marco Fabian for Juarez drives towards goal at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Important block from the Juarez defence as Victor Sosa fires in a strike for Pachuca.
Throw-in for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 15, Juarez drives forward and Dario Lezcano gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Juarez.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Pachuca have a goal kick.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 20, Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ciudad Juarez.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Juarez territory.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Juarez.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Juarez throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Free kick Juarez.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Juarez a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Pachuca.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Victor Guzman.
In the minute 35, Victor Davila with an assist there.
Throw-in for Juarez in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Can Pachuca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Juarez's half?
In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Juarez.
Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In the minute 40, Throw-in high up the field for Pachuca in Ciudad Juarez.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Throw-in Pachuca.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 43, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In Ciudad Juarez Juarez attack through Martin Rabunal. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Juarez.
Juarez have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Juarez.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 47, Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team have replaced Martin Rabunal with Luis Hernandez. This is the first substitution made today by Gabriel Caballero.
Juarez will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Pachuca.
In the minute 48, Flavio Santos is replacing Alberto Acosta for the home team.
Juarez's William Mendieta has been booked in Ciudad Juarez.
In the minute 50, Erick Aguirre (Pachuca) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pachuca are pushing forward but Victor Sosa's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
In the minute 52, In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Juarez push upfield and Blas Armoa gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Pachuca defence.
In the minute 53, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
Victor Sosa (Pachuca) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in Juarez.
Gabriel Caballero is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez with Mauro Fernandez replacing Blas Armoa.
Eryc Castillo is replacing William Mendieta for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Juarez a goal kick.
Juarez have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia waits before resuming play because Oscar Ustari for Pachuca is still down.
Pachuca's Oscar Ustari is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 62, Goal! Juarez go level at 1-1 through Eryc Castillo in Ciudad Juarez.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ciudad Juarez.
In the minute 65, Pachuca's Victor Davila misses with an attempt on goal.
Juarez have a goal kick.
Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
In the minute 66, Juarez to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Free kick Juarez.
Juarez surge into the attack at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez but Bruno Romo’s header is off-target.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Pachuca are coming forward and Victor Sosa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ciudad Juarez.
Free kick for Juarez in the half of Pachuca.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Pachuca a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Pachuca drive upfield and Victor Guzman gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Juarez defender.
Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Attention is being given to Juarez’s Marco Fabian and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 74, Paulo Pezzolano (Pachuca) is making a first substitution, with Felipe Pardo replacing Victor Sosa.
The away team replace Victor Davila with Romario Ibarra.
Throw-in for Juarez in the half of Pachuca.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Marco Fabian is back on his feet again.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Juarez throw-in in Pachuca's half.
In the minute 77, Felipe Pardo (Pachuca) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Juarez.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Pachuca throw-in in Juarez's half.
In the minute 79, Pachuca's Erick Aguirre gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Juarez have a goal kick.
Jesus Zavala (Juarez) has replaced the possibly injured Marco Fabian.
In the minute 81, Pachuca's Roberto de la Rosa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Juarez defender.
Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a throw-in for Juarez, close to Pachuca's area.
In the minute 83, Jose Jaoquin Esquivel (Juarez) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Juarez have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Juarez.
Jesus Zavala (Juarez) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Free kick Juarez.
Pachuca make their third substitution with Efrain Orona replacing Erick Sanchez.
In the minute 87, Juarez to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Juarez attack but Dario Lezcano's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 88, Pachuca have a goal kick.
Juarez pushes forward through Eryc Castillo, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ciudad Juarez.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Juarez a goal kick.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In Ciudad Juarez, Oscar Murillo (Pachuca) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Eryc Castillo of Juarez is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Juarez.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Pachuca.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Pachuca close to the penalty box.
Pachuca's Oscar Murillo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Juarez have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Ciudad Juarez. The final score is 1-1.
